This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly constant which exists from 2010 to 2014.
Conversely, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2016 to 2019.

On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely constant which exists from 2008 to 2010.
